item.title: Configuring Emacs for Rust development
item.description: Emacs is great for editing Rust source files. In addition to your normal Emacs configuration (such as completion modes) it requires 3 packages. First you will want lsp-mode, a very full featured LSP client for Emacs. Additionally you will want lsp-ui, which I only use for the lsp-ui-imenu feature. Finally you will want to use rustic as primary editing mode for Rust files. elisp elisp code snippet start ;; For all setttings see: https://emacs-lsp.
